content: socks on a plane a pattern by laura linneman materials 400 yards of fingering weight yarn or yarn that gets a gauge of 7 stitches to the inch in stockinette stitch yarn used in sample is barking dog opposites attract in darcy and elizabeth size 1 5 2 5 mm needles 2 circulars in 16 inch length cable needle tapestry needle sizes medium 8 inches and large 9 inches le sock using your preferred cast-on method for toe-up socks judy s magic cast on was used in the samples above cast on 32 stitches 16 on each circular needle knit across both needles once 1 complete round begin to increase the toe as follows round 1 *k1 kf&b knit until 2 stitches remain on needle kf&b k1 repeat from * on second needle round 2 knit all stitches repeat these two rounds until the total number of stitches on both needles equals 56 64 28 32 on each needle copyright laura linneman llinnema@gmail com www theknitgirllls com page 1/6 copyright laura linneman llinnema@gmail com www theknitgirllls com page 2/6 foot note the bottom/sole of the foot will be worked on needle 2 and is stockinette knit every round until the heel increases round 1 on needle 1 knit 2 stitches place the first marker work the 10 stitches of row 1 of the cable pattern chart/written directions on page 3 place second marker knit the remaining 16 20 stitches of the row on needle 2 knit all stitches rounds 2-6 on needle 1 you will knit 2 stitches sm work the corresponding cable pattern chart/written direction row sm knit to the end of the needle on needle 2 you will knit all stitches continue in this manner until the foot of the sock is 2 5 inches less than the total desired length copyright laura linneman llinnema@gmail com www theknitgirllls com page 3/6 the gusset round 1 on needle 1 continue to work in pattern as before on needle 2 k1 kf&b k until 2 stitches remain kf&b k1 round 2 on needle 1 continue to work in pattern on needle 2 knit all stitches continue to work rounds 1 and 2 until there are 48 56 stitches on needle 2 turning the heel working back and forth only on needle 2 turn the heel as follows row 1 rs k27 31 ssk k1 turn row 2 ws slip 1 p7 p2tog p1 turn row 3 slip 1 k8 ssk k1 turn row 4 slip 1 p9 p2tog p1 turn row 5 slip 1 k10 ssk k1 turn row 6 slip 1 p11 p2tog p1 turn continue in this manner until all the stitches are worked and you again have 28 32 stitches on needle 2 the leg resume working in the round resume working the pattern as before work the leg until it is 1 5 inched shy of the desired length cuff round 1 k2 sm work in charted/written cable pattern over 10 stitches sm *k2 p2 repeat
